sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: We take our obligations under the Singapore Personal Data Protection Act 2012 seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and process your personal data.

sections.title: Personal Data Collection
sections.content: We may collect personal data when you use our contact page, error logging tools, or through details of your visits to our Website.

sections.title: Cookies
sections.content: Cookies are used to enhance user experience. You can accept or decline cookies through browser settings, but disabling cookies may limit functionality.

sections.title: Use of Personal Data
sections.content: Personal data is used for managing accounts, contacting users, administering the Website, personalizing interactions, conducting research, and legal compliance.

sections.title: Disclosure of Information
sections.content: Personal data may be disclosed to third parties for outlined purposes. We do not sell or rent personal data.

sections.title: Transfer of Personal Data
sections.content: Personal data may be transferred, processed, and stored outside of Singapore under protective agreements.

sections.title: Updating Information
sections.content: Ensure the accuracy of submitted personal data and notify us of any changes.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You may withdraw consent, request access to, or correct your personal data held by us, subject to a reasonable fee.

sections.title: Changes to Privacy Policy
sections.content: We reserve the right to amend this Privacy Policy at any time. Continued use of our Website signifies acceptance of updates.

sections.title: Further Information
sections.content: For inquiries, contact our Data Protection Officer at admin@tradeint.com.
